item.title: Enable Azure Virtual Desktop Insights automated
item.description: Azure Virtual Desktop (AVD) Insights is a way to get sight into your AVD environment. In short (from Microsoft), Azure Virtual Desktop Insights is a dashboard built on Azure Monitor Workbooks that helps IT professionals understand their Azure Virtual Desktop environments.
